data.description:
Xtadium is the ultimate social VR and MR sports experience that combines the excitement of live, on-demand, and pay-per-view access to sporting events:
- Experience NBA games courtside, with free live games from the '23-'24 NBA season
- NBA League Pass holders can access an exclusive Multi-Game NBA experience in Mixed Reality 
- Sit octagon-side for UFC LFA and Cage Warriors events.
- Check out more sports content from NASCAR, X Games, BeIn (La Liga) and more!
Immerse yourself in a revolutionary VR sports experience by sitting in the front row from home. Or stay connected with reality by surrounding yourself with multiple screens in Mixed Reality that you can drag and drop around your room. With the addition of hand tracking, you can interact with the content like never before, making your sports viewing experience even more dynamic and immersive.

changelog.change_log:
New Feature: Hand Tracking
We are excited to introduce hand tracking to enhance your experience! With this new feature, you can navigate menus, interact with content, and control your viewing experience using intuitive hand gestures. This update makes your VR and MR sports experiences more immersive and dynamic than ever before.
Enjoy the multigame experience. Watch up to 8 NBA games at the same time in Mix Reality Mode.
2.2.1 patch: Small improvements and deeplink support
2.0.1 patch: Small bug fixing and improvements on interactable graphics

- Added time shift during live events. Re-watch any moment of the live events from the point of view you choose.
- Added different slow-motion playback speeds.
- Use the new emotes feature to show your reaction to the content while you enjoy a watch party with your friends.
- Added interactive statistics and interactive graphics support.
